text: An elephant migrating around their sighting. Swaga Swaga Game Reserve is a Tanzanian game reserve that gives refuge to elephants and other vulnerable animals. It is located 50.6 miles from the city of Babati. Swaga Swaga also contains 102 lions, and since Tanzania has the most lions in Africa, Swaga Swaga has almost 0.6% of Tanzania's sighted lions. == References == Category:Game reserves Category:Protected areas of Tanzania
title: Swaga Swaga Game Reserve
